subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Sabres placed their captain, Craig Rivet, on waivers in a bid to clear their books of a defenseman who has spent much of the season recovering from injuries and struggling for playing time.
snippet: The Buffalo Sabres placed their captain, Craig Rivet, on waivers in a bid to clear their books of a defenseman who has spent much of the season recovering from injuries and struggling for playing time.
